channel.title: CVE Feed for Dahua Technologies -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Dahua Technologies -- all products

item.title: CVE-2017-9314|2024-08-05T17:02:44.205Z -- dahua%20technologies -- nvr50xx%2C%20vr52xx%2C%20vr54xx%2C%20vr58xx
item.description: Authentication vulnerability found in Dahua NVR models NVR50XX, NVR52XX, NVR54XX, NVR58XX with software before DH_NVR5xxx_Eng_P_V2.616.0000.0.R.20171102. Attacker could exploit this vulnerability to gain access to additional operations by means of forging json message.

Customer of Dahua IP camera or IP PTZ could submit relevant device information to receive a time limited temporary password from Dahua authorized dealer to reset the admin password. The algorithm used in this mechanism is potentially at risk of being compromised and subsequently utilized by attacker.

item.title: CVE-2017-9317|2024-08-05T17:02:44.373Z -- dahua%20technologies -- xvr%205x04%2C%20xvr%205x08%2C%20xvr%205x16%2C%20xvr%207x16%2C%20ipc-hdbw4xxx%2C%20ipc-hdbw5xxx
item.description: Privilege escalation vulnerability found in some Dahua IP devices. Attacker in possession of low privilege account can gain access to credential information of high privilege account and further obtain device information or attack the device.

item.title: CVE-2017-9316|2024-08-05T17:02:44.338Z -- dahua%20technologies -- ipc-hdw4300s%5Cnvr11hs%5Cipc-hfw4x00%5Cipc-hdw4x00%5Cipc-hdbw4x00%5Cipc-hf5x00%5Cipc-hfw5x00%5Cipc-hdw5x00%5Cipc-hdbw5x00%5Cnvr11hs
item.description: Firmware upgrade authentication bypass vulnerability was found in Dahua IPC-HDW4300S and some IP products. The vulnerability was caused by internal Debug function. This particular function was used for problem analysis and performance tuning during product development phase. It allowed the device to receive only specific data (one direction, no transmit) and therefore it was not involved in any instance of collecting user privacy data or allowing remote code execution.
